name: twenty-one
description:
it's your 21st birthday! to celebrate, you and your friends decide to spend a night on the beach to party. but the locals have other plans..

-

twenty-one is a mini adventure resulting from a disagreement with the locals at the beach. play as the birthday-celebrant and defend yourself while trying to find a safe space to have your party!

the game has three different endings, depending on the decisions you make (hint: seaweed)

-

controls:

LEFT or A: move left

RIGHT or D: move right

SPACE: jump

CLICK: use or pick up items

-

known bugs:

enemies walk off their platforms/fall over

letterboxing moves buttons' click areas into the black bar areas

-

this game was made for the i can't draw game jam, which i entered to push myself into completing my first ever game! :D
